Fetch plot data

PlotFetcher.Rd

Class for extracting metadata from database

Usage

Arguments

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

PlotFetcher$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
